Would this actually exist?  

I know let is defined outside this scope... but will this actually persist?

yes =)

> Variables declared by let have their scope in the block for which they are defined, as well as in any contained sub-blocks. 

[source](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/let#Scoping_rules_2)

actually, if you're worried about `theme` variable, it is a const that was [being used before](https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat/pull/13953/files#diff-8041caddb7bb0c9a1cc6a67a9501d845L170) as well
